programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Summer Demon - Visit the ancient retainer that exorcises evil. Nico's mother, Ibuki, has delivered a new prophecy. Ibuki has an idea who this ancient retainer could be, and tells Nico and her familiars to visit them. They were a bit of a ways away, so Nico, Morihito, Kanshi, Keigo, and Nemu head to the lands where this ancient retainer lives with a summer vacation feeling.

programme.title: D.Gray-Man S1 Ep75
programme.desc: Clown And Auguste - Allens vows to protect Lenalee and begins the fight with the Earl. The Earl assures Allen they will continue the fight before disappearing.

programme.desc: Key And Noah's Door - Lero kidnaps Lenalee, and the Exorcists follow them into the portal, only to see the infamous Noah's Ark in the sky before being attacked by Akuma.

programme.desc: Blame It On The Spring - Koshitan finds Nokotan in tears at the clubhouse, but it's just hay fever. Now Nokotan looks for ways to cope!

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Miharu Kiryu, The Vampire / Missing Parasol / I'm So Glad You're Here - The vampire Miharu Kiryu has moved into the Otogi household. Because he's a vampire, he tends to be a nightowl and lazily doesn't wake up until past noon. On top of that, he needs to siphon life energy to survive, so he immediately gets some from Morihito after waking up. He may not do well in a communal living environment, so will this further power up the chaos in the Otogi house?

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep17
programme.desc: We Got Trapped In A Death Game (but It Sucked) / Long Long A Go Go - A strange mask was attached to their faces, and Morihito, Kanshi, Keigo, and Miharu were transported to an unknown room while they were sleeping. The monitor in the room suddenly turns on and says, My name is Zigzag. Play a game with me. A strange mask, a deep voice-changed voice, and orders from beyond the monitor. They were trapped in a death game, and Nico was a hostage.

programme.title: Grand Blue S1 Ep3
programme.desc: A New World - Iori and Kohei don wetsuits and head to the sea! Although Iori used to be afraid of the water, he starts becoming more interested. But diving equipment is expensive! Tokita and Kotobuki decide to hold a Men's beauty pageant for the Izu Spring Festival in May. The guys want to avoid being paraded around on stage, so they try to get Chisa to participate in a woMen's beauty pageant.

programme.title: Grand Blue S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Male Beauty Pageant - The Izu Spring Festival has begun! The members of Peek-a-Boo run an okonomiyaki stall with Iori, Kohei, Chisa, and Azusa helping out. Iori finds himself in a complicated situation when a misunderstanding with Azusa occurs and a rivalry with the tennis club Tinkerbell begins. When Chisa gets nervous and freezes up during the woMen's beauty pageant, Iori and Kohei think of a plan to cheer her on.

programme.title: Grand Blue S1 Ep3
programme.desc: A New World - Iori and Kohei don wetsuits and head to the sea! Although Iori used to be afraid of the water, he starts becoming more interested. But diving equipment is expensive! Tokita and Kotobuki decide to hold a Men's beauty pageant for the Izu Spring Festival in May. The guys want to avoid being paraded around on stage, so they try to get Chisa to participate in a woMen's beauty pageant.

programme.title: Grand Blue S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Male Beauty Pageant - The Izu Spring Festival has begun! The members of Peek-a-Boo run an okonomiyaki stall with Iori, Kohei, Chisa, and Azusa helping out. Iori finds himself in a complicated situation when a misunderstanding with Azusa occurs and a rivalry with the tennis club Tinkerbell begins. When Chisa gets nervous and freezes up during the woMen's beauty pageant, Iori and Kohei think of a plan to cheer her on.

programme.title: D.Gray-Man S1 Ep77
programme.desc: Skin Bolic's Room - Kanda tells the others to go without him while he fights the Noah and Skin Bolic. In Edo, Marie and Tiedoll continue fighting the combined Akuma.

programme.title: D.Gray-Man S1 Ep78
programme.desc: Taboo, Three Illusions - Kanda activates his Kinki Sangenshiki when the room is near collapse, and Kanda unleashes a final attack on Skin but fails to kill Skin.

programme.title: The Daily Life Of A Middle-Aged Online Shopper In Another World S1 Ep9
programme.desc: So It's A Spider, So What? - Kenichi goes to the dungeon Myare discovered and finds a lot of crystals, but a giant cave spider suddenly appears.

programme.title: The Daily Life Of A Middle-Aged Online Shopper In Another World S1 Ep10
programme.desc: The Story Of Canals - Kenichi takes over the construction of the canal, but it's hard to finish on time when the forest hasn't been cleared.

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Miharu Kiryu, The Vampire / Missing Parasol / I'm So Glad You're Here - The vampire Miharu Kiryu has moved into the Otogi household. Because he's a vampire, he tends to be a nightowl and lazily doesn't wake up until past noon. On top of that, he needs to siphon life energy to survive, so he immediately gets some from Morihito after waking up. He may not do well in a communal living environment, so will this further power up the chaos in the Otogi house?

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep17
programme.desc: We Got Trapped In A Death Game (but It Sucked) / Long Long A Go Go - A strange mask was attached to their faces, and Morihito, Kanshi, Keigo, and Miharu were transported to an unknown room while they were sleeping. The monitor in the room suddenly turns on and says, My name is Zigzag. Play a game with me. A strange mask, a deep voice-changed voice, and orders from beyond the monitor. They were trapped in a death game, and Nico was a hostage.

programme.desc: Morocco - Nick's train leaves from Tangier and it's a special one, Al Boraq, which speeds along the high-speed line making its way down the west coast. programme.title: Chasing Monsters S4 Ep5
programme.desc: Northern Predators - Cyril goes to the edge of the Arctic to hear terrifying tales of huge fish ripping apart fishermen's nets. He sets off in pursuit of a legendary giant fish.

programme.title: Race Across the World S5 Ep9
programme.desc: Series 5, Episode 9 - The five pairs meet for the first time since returning home.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Great Cities of the World S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Paris - Joanna's first view of Paris is from a hot air balloon, she visits the fire-damaged Notre-Dame, meets heiress Daphne Guinness, buys a vintage Chanel suit, and meets refugee turned beekeeper Ibrahim.

programme.title: Human S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The First of Us - The extraordinary story of how the human species, Homo sapiens, first emerged, where the discoveries of recent years are revolutionising the understanding of humanity's origin story.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Summer - Summer in Africa is a season of extremes, it separates the weak from the strong. It tests the survival instincts of cheetahs, lions, geckos, turtles and many more species as they search for food and water in the extreme heat of summer.

programme.title: Stormborn S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Children of the Storm - In Iceland only one out of six cubs has survived. Abandoned by her parents, she now has to fend for herself. The reindeer herd swim two miles across open water. In Scotland, 35,000 grey seals arrive for their annual breeding season.

programme.title: The Great Elephant Tale
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of three elephants across three very distinct African habitats. Their travels combine to tell the story of how these emotional and intelligent creatures evolved over millions of years to survive on the continent.

programme.title: Super Shark Highway S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Into the Darkness - Stay up late as the northern team attaches an activity tag to a bull shark and finds out what this night owl does after sunset. Then dive 80 meters deep with the southern team, who are hoping to put a satellite tracker on a female great white.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Kogelberg - Considered to be the most beautiful of the Cape's protected areas, Kogelberg Nature Reserve has experienced minimal human interference. Discover the spectacular land and sea life flourishing in this unique botanical wonderland.

programme.title: Deep In The Heart
programme.desc: Take a journey through the eyes of catfish, ocelots, and other native creatures with narrator Matthew McConaughey. Celebrate the Lone Star State's landscapes and wildlife, and learn how crucial conservation efforts can save Texas' unique habitats.

programme.title: Macaque Island S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Young Up-Start - Explore the lush treed cityscape where fluffy male Matnoor rules over the 30-member-strong Street Troop with an iron fist. Then meet Aarav, the old alpha who oversees the wilder Hill Troop. Which will up-and-comer Loci challenge for the crown?

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year S1 Ep2

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Lola the Sea Lion Pup - Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentina's coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Maria's side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.

programme.title: Aussie Snake Wranglers: Deadly Pursuit S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Deadly Intruders - Dash across southeast Queensland as breeding and snake-catching season ramp up. Watch Adele and Mick go up against an eastern brown, the second deadliest snake in the world, while Stu and Liv tangle with a carpet python.

programme.title: Aussie Snake Wranglers: Deadly Pursuit S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Snake Face Off - Launch into spring's snake surge with Liv and Stu, who intercept two male brown snakes duelling for mating rights at a construction site. Stand back as Dan and Jess rescue chickens from a python, and Mick and Adele hunt for a rogue green tree snake.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas S1 Ep4
programme.desc: India - Welcome to India - a land of exotic animals and exotic warfare. Monkeys stage dusty dust-ups, blackbucks wage open war on the open plains, and peacock dandies swing switchblades: these are colorful battles worthy of a vibrant land.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Tropical Shores - Explore the shores of the Northern Territory and the abundant waters of the Great Barrier Reef. Face flooded roads, hungry saltwater crocs, and killer jellyfish as Lizzie investigates why so many strange, deadly creatures make this remote area home.

programme.title: Uptown Otters S1 Ep1
programme.desc: City of Riches - Stake out the Bay Family's lush territory, where matriarch Anna offers lavish feasts but faces internal dissent. Size up her rival Mia, the streetwise Townies leader who's eyeing a lifestyle upgrade, and check in with the isolated Mangrove Family.

programme.title: Uptown Otters S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Home Away from Home - Swim upriver with the Bay Family, where Anna offers a hand raising her grandpups before heading home to find interlopers on her turf. Watch a flood in the mangroves nearly sweep away a baby, and see the Townies eat clean through their resources.

programme.title: Macaque Island S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Grass is Greener - Go on a junk-food-fuelled urban holiday with the Street Troop, then watch the Hill Troop's invasion of their turf turn sour. Monitor the Sisterhood's plot to kidnap Sara's baby before newly minted alpha Loci discovers his old rival is back in town.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Autumn - Autumn in Africa brings opportunities. Cape Fur seals, Samango monkeys, chameleons, impala, and more respond to the season. Autumn triggers changes in the lives of many animals. Rare creatures reveal themselves and predators gather to take advantage.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Coast - Massive elephant seals go nose to nose to win the title of beachmaster, and giant petrels earn the nickname, murderous garbagemen. Meanwhile, a female humpback goes to extremes to protect her calf from amorous males.

programme.title: Uptown Otters S1 Ep1

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Cool South - Say goodbye to the tropics and dip into cool southern-coast waters. Come face to face with majestic grey nurse sharks, shape-shifting cuttlefish, and huge blue whales, play with penguins and sea lions, and learn why these seas are brimming with life.

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Littlest Cub - Get to know Winston, a tiny abandoned cub who imprints on Judy as she nurses him 24-7. Feel the heartbreak as she severs their emotional attachment and teaches this sweet little fellow how to be a grown-up, independent bear in the non-human world.

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Meet the X-Girls - Welcome sisters Xiba, Xyla, and Xola, a trio of starving orphans who turn Winston's world upside down before gentle Xola teaches him a lesson about friendship. Then monitor new cubs Yasmine and Yara, who get reacquainted after a stressful separation.

programme.title: Macaque Island S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Clash of the Alphas - Stand back when a brawl erupts after the Street Troop finds the Hill Troop on their turf. Assess Matnoor's poor parenting skills, see alpha wannabe Ajit make his move, then cool off as a heat wave pushes everyone to share the wealth in the forest.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Winter - Be an eyewitness to the death and resurrection that winter brings to Africa. Observe what comes with shorter days, from drought conditions to frigid winds, and marvel at the survival skills of animals and plants as they face the season's fury.

programme.title: Super Shark Highway S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Detour - Travel to the ends of Australia's shark highways. Find out if Greenly Island in the south is a truck stop for migrating great whites, then search for proof of a genetic connection between northern bull sharks and their cooler-climate cousins.

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Littlest Cub - Get to know Winston, a tiny abandoned cub who imprints on Judy as she nurses him 24-7. Feel the heartbreak as she severs their emotional attachment and teaches this sweet little fellow how to be a grown-up, independent bear in the non-human world.

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Meet the X-Girls - Welcome sisters Xiba, Xyla, and Xola, a trio of starving orphans who turn Winston's world upside down before gentle Xola teaches him a lesson about friendship. Then monitor new cubs Yasmine and Yara, who get reacquainted after a stressful separation.

programme.title: Macaque Island S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Clash of the Alphas - Stand back when a brawl erupts after the Street Troop finds the Hill Troop on their turf. Assess Matnoor's poor parenting skills, see alpha wannabe Ajit make his move, then cool off as a heat wave pushes everyone to share the wealth in the forest.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Winter - Be an eyewitness to the death and resurrection that winter brings to Africa. Observe what comes with shorter days, from drought conditions to frigid winds, and marvel at the survival skills of animals and plants as they face the season's fury.

programme.title: Uptown Otters S1 Ep1
programme.desc: City of Riches - Stake out the Bay Family's lush territory, where matriarch Anna offers lavish feasts but faces internal dissent. Size up her rival Mia, the streetwise Townies leader who's eyeing a lifestyle upgrade, and check in with the isolated Mangrove Family.

programme.title: Uptown Otters S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Home Away from Home - Swim upriver with the Bay Family, where Anna offers a hand raising her grandpups before heading home to find interlopers on her turf. Watch a flood in the mangroves nearly sweep away a baby, and see the Townies eat clean through their resources.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Cool South - Say goodbye to the tropics and dip into cool southern-coast waters. Come face to face with majestic grey nurse sharks, shape-shifting cuttlefish, and huge blue whales, play with penguins and sea lions, and learn why these seas are brimming with life.

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep1

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep2

programme.desc: Amanda and Alan divide and conquer as they renovate the bathrooms. Amanda has big plans for converting one of the medieval tower rooms into a double-height sumptuous en-suite.

programme.desc: Amanda meets her match as she aims to turn the dark second bedroom into a country-chic boudoir, inspired by the Tuscan sunrise.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Series 2, Episode 1 - Rick braves the notoriously wild Atlantic waters to learn about the ancient fishing method of handlining at Sennen Cove off Land's End. The catch of the day is some deliciously plump pollock, which Rick uses to make the ultimate fish pie for the head gardener of Tresillian House, John Harris.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Cooking for Less S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Series 1, Episode 4 - Jamie demonstrates how to make great dishes from frozen food. Jamie makes a sumptuous frozen fish Pie, a one pan spicy chicken dish and creamy frozen cauliflower spaghetti. Jamie introduces a great dish for batch cooking, Minestrone soup and cheesy garlic bread and ends with a microwave chocolate pudding.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby S5 Ep8
programme.desc: Hotel Hubertus, Italy - Christmas Special - In the Alpine Tyrol region of Northern Italy lies Hotel Hubertus - a family run resort which offers spectacular views of the surrounding mountains thanks to its extraordinary architecture. Rob and Monica discover the unique Heaven and Hell spa, local ski experiences and are welcomed into the family behind the vision.

programme.desc: Liskeard Cornwall Revisit 2023 - In 2017, Leigh and Richard bought a derelict Cornish flour mill to restore and turn into their home. By 2021, rooms and landscaping were still unfinished.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Iced Out - Frustrated that she's not fitting in with the team, Aggro goes off on her own with Elbone on a mission to save a dragon egg trapped in ice.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Adventure - Puss misses the old days adventuring with his buddy Jack Sprat. Fearful he will leave San Lorenzo, Dulcinea concocts a super special adventure surprise with the orphans. But Jack Sprat shows up with the promise of a damsel in distress who turns out to be a super scary monster.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Fountains - Puss and Dulcinea embark on an adventure to find the Fountain of Youth to save Puss' old mentor, El Guante Blanco.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 Ep1
programme.desc: A Cause for The Paws - Po, at the top of his game but lonely, comes across two weasels stealing an earthquake causing gauntlet and tries to stop them, but inadvertently destroys a town. He loses his title as Dragon Master and teams up with Wandering Blade, a knight on a mission from England, to track down the weasels and get his title back.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Knights Code - Po and Blade's personalities clash as they track Klaus and Veruca and fight off some of Po's old foes. Blade gets to see Po's kung fu mastery, but doesn't agree to team up with him until she realizes that he accidentally holds the key to finding Klaus and Veruca: he has a piece of the WuGao Gauntlet. Meanwhile, Klaus and Veruca continue on their path of destruction while looking for the mysterious "Lotus".

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Eat Pray Shove - Clover is forced to take a vacation, and while she's away, she meets the handsome and free-spirited Sage Moondancer.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S1 Ep7
programme.desc: He Blinded Me With Science - Julien teams up with Timo, the tenrec, a scientist who the King elists to automate everything in the kingdom.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Game Show - It's Game Show Day in the dollhouse! Our wily and well-groomed host, CatRat, leads Gabby and Pandy around the dollhouse, where they compete in Gab-ified games, like Tushy Tunes on the butt xylophone couch and a cooking competition of Bakey with Cakey. They win tickets and trade them in for prizes at the end.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Kitty Pirates - Gabby unboxes a pirate treasure map in the shape of the dollhouse (a piece of it has been torn off). This must mean it's time for a pirate treasure hunt in the dollhouse! Pirate Gabby and Pirate Pandy head out on their journey across the many lands of the dollhouse to find the Gabby Cats Treasure!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep54
programme.desc: Imaginary Friends - After Boss insults Tina's imaginary friend, he's forced into "Imaginary Friend Sensitivity Training" at Baby Corp. Boss makes up his own imaginary friend to get out of these meetings, but after Tina gets a whiff that he may be lying, he's forced to keep up the charade at work and at home.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep55
programme.desc: Turf War - It's a turf war when Bounce House Bruiser Baby encroaches on Delivery Baby's tricycle park! Tina attempts to befriend Bruiser in order to woo her back to the bounce house, but naughty behavior is the only language Bruiser understands. Determined to win this kid over, Tina ends up going rogue as a trike hoodlum, and her own field team is forced to reign her in.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep56
programme.desc: Trading Up - Boss takes an overdue vacation day, and ends up teaching Tabitha the value of "trading up" valueless objects into something she actually wants, an electric scooter. However, a 5%er baby is in trouble and BB's field team has "got it under control" or do they? Boss tries to juggle his Tabitha lessons with sneaking peeks at the mission in progress

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Thunk Tank - When a freak lightning strike turns Thunk into a genius, Phil is thrilled to have someone likeminded on the farm, until the farm residents start asking Thunk for help with problems on the farm instead of him.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Home Punch Home - Tired of the farm's feud with the neighboring punch monkeys, Ugga arranges a punch summit where the Bettermans and Croods will stay in the punch monkey village to learn how to all get along.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Goodbye Crood World - When Phil detects a meteor is hurtling towards the farm, the Bettermans and Croods must decide how to spend their last day on earth.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep26
programme.desc: The Night Lights: Part 2 - When Thunder's clan of fellow Nightlights is attacked by the Snow Wraith, Tom vows to rescue them.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep1
programme.desc: First Flight: Part 1 - Moving to an exotic new home, an adventurous teenager meets a new group of kids and discovers a dragon in the fissure.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep2
programme.desc: First Flight: Part 2 - Tom forges a friendship with the dragon and discovers an entire world of dragons within the fissure.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S2 Ep37
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ludicrous Lunacy of the Loopy Laserlightmare - Despite being terrible at the job, Krupp wants to be the camp director again next summer. That's something Harold and George simply cannot abide.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S2 Ep38
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shocking Showdown of the Staggering Sugamechangere - It's parents' weekend at Lake Summer Camp, and Krupp's eager to make amends with Harold and George ... or so he says.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S2 Ep39
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Polarizing Plight of the Pitiless Poopetrators - George and Harold want Cash Networth to buy the camp and fire Krupp. But before he'll agree to pony up the dough, Cash has a small request of his own.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Research & Developments - Turtleneck wants to crack the Stinkless Serum formula and makes it a competition, pitting worker babies against worker babies, stating that the first one to the Serum will be the new CEO!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Wrinkles & Stickles - After Turtleneck is captured by Frederic Estes, Boss Baby and Tim attempt to rescue her, leading them to the terrifying "fun house" at the town fair

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S2 Ep27
programme.desc: Bossa Nova - After Boss Baby is fired from Baby Corp,he attempts to navigate regular baby life in a Mommy/Daddy/Baby playgroup. Even worse,the playgroup's other new member is Mega Fat,whose animatronic stuffie Wagby malfunctions and threatens the safety of the whole group. Meanwhile,Tim does everything he can to avoid doing his homework.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Fire Escape - Tom hatches an unorthodox plan to use a monstrous Nightmare to test Alex's new fire suits that endangers the secret of dragons.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Ride or Die - After a fight with her mom, Jun joins Tom on an adventure into the Fire Realm, where the knowledge of myths saves the day.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Empty Fireworm Nest - When a tiny Fireworm dragon ends up at ICARIS, Alex has to decide between her moms' excitement and keeping the dragon secret.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S2 Ep37
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ludicrous Lunacy of the Loopy Laserlightmare - Despite being terrible at the job, Krupp wants to be the camp director again next summer. That's something Harold and George simply cannot abide.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge S2 Ep40
programme.desc: Defenders Of The Wing Part 2 - Hiccup, Mala, Astrid, Fishlegs, and Snotlout go searching for the now captured Eruptodon, but little do they know that Viggo has a sinister plan.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge S2 Ep41
programme.desc: Gruff Around The Edges - When a distant cousin of the Twins named Gruffnut arrives on Dragon's Edge, Tuffnut tries to impress him, but Gruffnut may not be the hero he seems.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender S2 Ep40
programme.desc: The Prisoner - Team Voltron grapples with whether or not they can trust Lotor

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods S2 Ep40
programme.desc: A Few Good Grugs , Valley Shine Day - The Valley has the first try-all against the Croods to see if Grug stole food for the Broods, Thunk asks Kevin to teach him to be more irresistible

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S2 Ep40
programme.desc: Lucky and the Railroad Ransom - When Butch LePray hold Jim for ransom, Lucky and Spirit team up with the unlikeliest of allies to get her father back

programme.title: Dinotrux S2 Ep41
programme.desc: Snow Blazer - While trying to get home from a snowy area north of their crater, the gang meets a lonely but helpful Trux named Snowblazer who helps them navigate.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Ooo Ooo's Jungle Drums - Raa Raa has found an infectious beat, and soon all the other animals in the jungle are joining in except for Ooo Ooo, who just can't get the beat right. How can they find a way for all the friends to play together?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Topsy's Musical Stones - Topsy has readied the musical stones for a noisy game. Raa Raa has been left in charge, making sure that nobody jumps on them while Topsy reminds the other jungle inhabitants about the game. But temptation can be strong especially when Ooo Ooo is about...

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Raa Raa's Noisy Present - Raa Raa has made his friend Topsy a wonderful present - a noisy set of chimes. But she doesn't want them. Who else in the jungle might like a very noisy set of wind chimes?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Raa Raa's Big Roar - Raa Raa finds it really funny that all his friends come running every time he roars really loudly. The other jungle inhabitants are less amused, they only come because there are worried about their friend. What is Raa Raa to do when he gets into trouble and nobody comes to his rescue?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Scritch Scratch - Raa Raa always scratches his claws in the morning, but his scratching post has fallen apart. He sets off to find himself a new one in the jungliest bit. When he does eventually find a new scratching post it is huge, how is he going to get it home again?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Hurry Up Raa Raa - Raa Raa has agreed to do too many things with too many people today. Will he be able to do them and keep all his friends happy? More importantly, will it make him happy?

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Meow-Mazing Games - When Gabby, Pandy, and Carlita prepare for the annual Meow-Mazing Games, they encounter stiff competition from the Doodads and must work together to bring home the coveted dollhouse trophy.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Pandy's Birthday - It's Pandy's birthday!! The dollhouse is throwing a surprise party for him! Gabby goes room to room preparing all his favorite things for the party, but when the big moment comes, Pandy drops his cake! Gabby consoles him and tells him it's even better - now, they have smash cake! They all hold up a piece and pose for a picture.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S2 Ep45
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Disturbing Dilemma Of The Dysfunctional Doppelgangers - The crew meets their blue-hued doppelgngers when they crash-land on an alien planet where kids call all the shots.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S2 Ep44
programme.desc: Chicago - Boss and family go on Spring Break to visit his grandparents in the big city of Chicago. Boss uses the trip to test his business mettle, by getting in a promotion war at a real big adult company. And when a department store refuses to let Gigi and Tim return an item, they wind up unionizing the entire sales force.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Cave New World - When the adults exclude the kids from their adult-only cave, the kids make their own much cooler cave, soon making the adults want to switch caves.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep3
programme.desc: A Hole New World - Tom and Jun encounter unexpected dangers and are separated while exploring the Hidden Realm of dragons. Tom introduces Jun to the dragon world, and Jun bonds with a dragon of her own - Wu and Wei.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Sewer Koi and the Museum Heist - An earth-shaking rumble signals the arrival of a new creature, but Yi and Jin butt heads, each convinced they're the better team leader. The crew eventually discovers that the massive Sewer Koi is behind the earthquakes, but he's missing his precious pearl, the key to a magical underground dam. Without it, the sewer's water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! It's going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before it's too late.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! S2 Ep43
programme.desc: Doc Doc Who's There?,Tour Guide of Duty - In order to improve her bedside manner, Doctor Moonbloom embarks on a new career as a comedian. But could it be that this is her true calling?/ Branch is sick of Trolls not coming to him with their problems. Seeking to prove that he is a helpful Troll, he agrees to assist Tug Duluth in finding a new tour.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep10
programme.desc: MerCat Gets Her Sparkle Back - When Gabby unboxes beakers filled with a magical potion, they conjure up an invite for Spa Day at the dollhouse! However, while decorating for MerCat's favorite day of the year, MerCat accidentally loses her color and sparkle. Gabby and Pandy must help her get her sparkle back for the big Spa Day party!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Itty Bitty Blossom - The dollhouse delivery is a special plant called an Itty Bitty Blossom that goes from newborn to full-grown in one day. Gabby and Pandy have to take care of the whiny and fussy growing Itty Bitty Blossom and make sure it is in its permanent soil spot before it's fully grown.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Moms Birthday , Angry - Kelp and Scallop enlist Cruz's help to perform a dance for Mom's birthday. Though it's hard at first, they learn to put their dolphin, unicorn, and narwhal powers together to create something special. / Kelp, Pixie, Ollie, and their friend Leroy try to help Juniper understand her angry feelings.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Tuskist , Three Moon Festival - Scallop is afraid of her first tuskist appointment. Kelp helps her get through it with a song. / Fog rolls in, threatening Kelp's first Three Moon Festival in Unicorn Land. Kelp and his friends use a combination of unicorn spark and the Kelp Way to create a new festival.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Rodney the Hero , Club Shed - When Rodney accidentally catches Sam when she falls from a tree and starts to believe he's a hero TZG secretly follow him around town to make sure his clumsy hero-ing doesn't go wrong. / When Lula and Luis want a clubhouse for the Squasher Fan Club, TZG secretly help fix up the shed in Luis' backyard.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 Ep20
programme.desc: It Takes a Zenko , What a Racket - When various townsfolk report having lost soft belongings, TZG secretly investigates to discover thieving pigeon Yolanda had been building a nest for baby gophers. / When Ian's lucky badminton racket goes missing, TZG secretly finds and returns it in time for a rematch against his toughest opponent.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Sick Day - When the other dragons come down with the flu, Summer must overcome her fear of eels to retrieve the cure and get her friends back in the air.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Bad Egg - Magnus hatches a plan to hide in an egg to spy on the Rescue Riders. But things get all scrambled when a mama dragon takes him to her nest.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Bravery - Tired of the Mayor's needy cowardice, Puss tries to reassure him that he is a hero - but being brave quickly goes to the Mayor's head.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Golem - The Golem, a giant clay enemy Puss has been outrunning for years, comes to San Lorenzo. With Artephius' help, Puss may be able to defeat his foe.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Lotus - Po's moral lines are blurred when he and Blade have to break an untrustworthy hedgehog monk (Zhen) out of jail to get more information on what Klaus and Veruca stole from the Lotus. They learn from Zhen that there are in fact three more weapons, and Po recognizes one of them from a comic book.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Legend of Master Long-Tooth - Po and Blade must convince a deceased comic book writer's son to give them information about an unreleased comic that may point them toward the next weapon: a whip of fire. However, after the events of 103 Po is now a wanted criminal, so the Emperor's Forbidden Company arrives and captures him. Torn between saving Po and the mission she's sworn to complete, Blade flees and abandons Po.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S1 Ep8

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S1 Ep9

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep10

However, while decorating for MerCat's favorite day of the year, MerCat accidentally loses her color and sparkle. Gabby and Pandy must help her get her sparkle back for the big Spa Day party!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep11

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep57

When Yvette joins in, Boss has to keep her from winning, out of fear that an evil babysitter will make family rules that overturn the Templeton household.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep58
programme.desc: Techy Tykes - Trying to win Tabitha's loyalty for Baby Corp, Boss and Tina invite her to Techy Tykes, a technology convention at their office. But when the top-secret UBO goes missing, the outsiders Tabitha and Tim (who's tagged along to relive his glory days) immediately become the number one suspects.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep59

The two battle at every stop of the birthday party tour, but when Boss's old work nemesis sets him up for an Federal Investigation Sting at an improv comedy show, Boss and Carol are forced to work together to escape the law.

programme.desc: Typewriter - Bluey, Snickers, and Winton are on their way to ask Calypso for help with their problems, when they are ambushed by the Terriers and use their unique talents to get past.

programme.desc: Andy and the Baby Elephant - On Jen's birthday she and Andy are sent to follow a new baby elephant to make sure it can use it's trunk properly.

programme.title: Dog Squad S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Mission: Hobby Fair - Charli and her disability assistance dog Tinks visit a Hobby Fair at Woofton Town Hall, where Charli is selling all the clever things she makes.

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Cassowary and Gharial - Steve and Aneeshwar meet a flightless bird called a cassowary. Then, they watch the Sunda gharial crocodilian being fed some fish and reveal an amazing connection they have with the cassowary.

programme.title: Playtime Towers S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Cup - Bella plays with her favourite cup - it makes the perfect drum for a sing along with Lift. Together, they visit Kingsley and Queenie who play the 'Tea Party Dash', but who will win?

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep9
programme.desc: The Tree Badge - Duggee helps the Squirrels learn about all the things trees do for creatures around them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep8
programme.desc: The Big Day Out Badge - Duggee takes the Squirrels and their parents on an exciting mystery trip.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep7
programme.desc: The Pen Pal Badge - Duggee arranges for the Squirrels to write to some pen pals.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep28
programme.desc: Ronda Reunion, Spain - Foz tries to play a Spanish guitar, and Xuli is delighted when her first ever souvenir selfie flutters out of it. It shows her on holiday as a child in a Spanish town with her long-lost friend Maria.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep27
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Rainbow - After a rainbow appears over the Go Jet Academy, Glitch becomes fascinated with the legend of a pot of gold appearing at the end of it.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep7
programme.desc: The Other Big Engine - While working on the Brazilian Railway, Thomas Meets Gustavo, another big blue engine who reminds him of Gordon back home.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep36
programme.desc: Park Trimming - Sarah & Duck do a spot of gardening.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep38
programme.desc: Cinema Scoot - Sarah and Duck join Scooter Boy at the cinema to watch his favourite film.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep35
programme.desc: Big Wheel - Stanley helps Seamus and Little Woo reconstruct the Big Wheel from Seamus' childhood. This is more difficult than Stanley thought it would be as it needs a clean and an upgrade.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep34
programme.desc: Buttons - Little Woo would like Stanley to help them find more noisy things in the museum. They go through the museum and pick out some things for a new exhibition.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep42
programme.desc: Fun Factory - Monty ponders why fun activities must end, when he and Jimmy Jones are told by Stan their time playing at the park for the day is finished.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep24
programme.desc: It's time to make a film - When JoJo hears the announcement of a new Captain Chloe film on the radio, she's disheartened to learn that it won't be available to watch for some time. Luckily, Gran Gran has a Gran Gran Plan!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep34
programme.desc: Space - Mackenzie, Jack and Rusty are playing as astronauts on a mission to Mars, but during their journey, Mackenzie keeps going missing and no one knows why, not even Mackenzie.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep35
programme.desc: Smoochy Kiss - Bluey and Bingo want Dad all to themselves and will not let Mum have a smoochy kiss. They try to hide him all around the house, but Mum is desperate to spend a little romance time with her husband.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep36
programme.desc: Dirt - Judo desperately wants to play in the dirt with Bluey and Bingo, but she is not supposed to get herself dirty.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep12
programme.desc: The Opposites Badge - The Squirrels have fun learning what opposites are, with help from their animal friends!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep11
programme.desc: The Radio Badge - The Squirrels decide to start their own radio show.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Hey Quacky! - Worm and Ladybird wonder what's going on at Squirrel Club. There's a gorilla playing drums, some helpful ducks, a hot frog, four goats and a hospital run by chicken doctors.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep8
programme.desc: The Brandenburg Gate, Germany - When Grandmaster Glitch takes the quadriga from the Brandenburg Gate, the Go Jetters must stop him before he reaches Grim HQ.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Cabbage - Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, it's the marvellous Cabbage.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Gooseberry - Gooseberry sings a song about everything you have to do to become a Gooseberry Club member

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Veggies Got to Dance - Supertato's dancing is too powerful and too destructive but when he has to face Evil Pea in a dance off to save his trapped friends he soon realises his dancing can save the day.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Banana's Star Appeal - Banana superstar's show is stopped when Pea steals his peel. Supertato races against Evil Pea to get it back but trouble hits when a giant Banana statue collapses onto the stage.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep107
programme.desc: Straws - Big straws appear in Teletubbyland and Tinky Winky, Dispy, Laa-Laa and Po wonder what to do with them. The Teletubbies blow through the straws to make colourful bubbles.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S6 Ep7
programme.desc: Strawberry - Dee encourages a friend to say 'strawberry', and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep22

This exciting tournament will showcase the best Sepaktakraw talent from across Asia, bringing together top teams and athletes to compete in a vibrant and dynamic environment.

programme.title: UFC Countdown EpUFC320AnkalaevvsPereira
programme.desc: UFC 320 Countdown previews two title fights. In the main event, Magomed Ankalaev battles Alex Pereira in a rematch for the light heavyweight crown. In the co-main event, Merab Dvalishvili puts his bantamweight belt on the line against Cory Sandhagen

programme.title: LALIGA TOP MOMENTS GERARD PIQUE
programme.desc: LALIGA TOP MOMENTS GERARD PIQUE - A towering presence at the back and a potent attacking force upfront. Complete domination by Barcelona club captain Gerard Pique.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC311MakhachevvsMoicano
programme.desc: Champion Islam Makhachev looks to break the record for the most consecutive UFC Lightweight title defenses as he faces fan favorite Renato Moicano in the main event of UFC 311, while Bantamweight Champion Merab Dvalishvili defends his belt for the first time against undefeated Umar Nurmagomedov in the co-main. Plus much more action on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep2
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep5
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1004TeixeiravsProchazka
programme.desc: UFC 275 featured Czech MMA star Jiri Prochazka in his third Octagon outing as he sought UFC gold against newly minted light heavyweight champion, Glover Teixeira. Relive their fight with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.desc: Champion Islam Makhachev looks to break the record for the most consecutive UFC Lightweight title defenses as he faces fan favorite Renato Moicano in the main event of UFC 311, while Bantamweight Champion Merab Dvalishvili defends his belt for the first time against undefeated Umar Nurmagomedov in the co-main. Plus much more action on UFC Reloaded.
